With us, your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed!


We prepare top of the line Supermicro servers packed with ram and RAID10. Every VPS node is powered by OpenVZ virtualization software.
Choose from any one of our U.S. or UK Datacenter locations and a wide selection of Operating Systems.
We take care of the infrastructure, network, and hardware, while you take care of your own virtual private server. We also offer cPanel/WHM addon to help you manage your environment.

Our VPS servers are completely dedicated to your account. A Virtual Private server can be used for a wide variety of purposes, including gaming, virtual (i.e., shared) hosting, and hosting of traffic-intensive Web sites.

All Our VPS hosting plans include:

- Full root access and dedicated server resources devoted to you
- Guaranteed CPU and RAM
- 15-Day Money Back Guarantee
- 100% Network Uptime SLA
- FREE Dedicated IP Address (€2.99 /mo. for each extra IP-s)
- Hardware RAID10
- FREE Data LockBox Backups, powered by R1soft
- FREE initial server hardening and security
- FREE initial software installation
- FREE Moving assitance and data transfer for moves
- FREE Enom reseller account
- FFMpeg, Live Video/Audio Support
- Full server management with WHM/cPanel as an Addon


We deliver fast & reliable business web hosting, that meets your needs.


WHO WE ARE?

Founded in 2007, EURO-SPACE is committed to providing the easiest and reliable VPS hosting solutions, so you can focus on building your online business without hassle. We manage our fastest and secure servers in the UK and US based datacenters designed to be the best in speed and reliability. With us, you never have to worry about your online presence, as we take care of it for you.

Our key factor is a quality. So we are fully concentrated to provide the best quality products and services on the competetive market. We're always looking for things we can improve, upgrade and add, to provide you the best and above the expectation.


HOW DO WE CARE?

Our servers are completely anonymous so your clients will never know we exist. You will have your own nameservers configured for your account to do a business under your brand.

We understand that the quality of the products & services we deliver must be equal to the price you pay, that's why we're always looking for things we can improve, upgrade and add, to provide you the best and above the expectation. In addition, if you decide that you are not completely happy with your hosting solutions, you'll receive your money back without asking questions.

Our in-house support team is available anytime you need a help. By phone, by chat or by support form, our web hosting experts are here to help you every step of the way.


WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS SAY?

We do not have the millions-strong customer base, but we do our best to deliver a cost-effective hosting solutions oriented on the quality. This includes fast & professional customer support, serious business attitude to our clients and industry leading technologies delivering best solutions for your business.

STATISTICS / CASE STUDIES
96% of our customers are happy with our services since 2007, so why don't you try too?
The history of the uptime is as follows:
- 2007, 2008, 2009 - 98.99%
- 2010, 2011 - 100%
- 2012 - 99.99%
- 2013 - 100%


Some of our customer testimonials can be found here
Some external reviews on WebHostDirectory
